casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
MALDONADO S248800 Supreme Court of California. JUNE 20, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

Petition for review granted; briefing deferred. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in In re Ricardo P., S230923 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
